thi-ap9:14.1: Parammukhā nisīditvā → puratthābhimukhā santi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | puratthābhimukhā ṭhitā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap9:18.3: Mātukucchigatā santī → mātukucchigataṃ santiṃ (bj) | mātu kucchigataṃ santaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap9:19.3: sūtikāgehe → sūtighare pajjalanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sūtighareva jalanti (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap9:22.3: vasantiyā → ca jhāyanyantyā (bj) | ca jhāyante (si) | pajjhāyantā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ca jhāyantā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
